attributes.action: BAN!!! NON-SMOKERS from whining on about SMOKING in Public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition that the government ban the hypocrtical non smoking citizens of this country from whining, moaning, complaining and generally blaming smokers for every wrong doing in the world.

On the issue of a fine by the Police the Non Smoker shall be informed of how smoking has paid for many of the luxuries they see today in the form of TAX. Remind them that banning smoking will only mean the government will require more tax from all of us to cover the spiralling cost of running this armpit of a country.
